item.title: LRSLab@CityU
item.description: Our group’s current research interest: Link to heading Developing applications/pipelines to accommodate the Nanopore DNA/RNA sequencing platform. Developing toolkits for genome assembly, scaffolding, finishing, improvement and comparative analysis. Studying the nucleotide modifications (like m6A) in RNAs (including viral/prokaryotic/eukaryotic RNAs). Mechanism of hybrid incompatibilities between Canorhabditis briggsae and nigoni. DNA modifications in acute myeloid leukemia (AML). Open positions: Link to heading Research student (PhD) position on bioinformatics. Research student (PhD) position on Canorhabditis based genetic research.

item.title: Software
item.description: trackcluster -[Python] - trackcluster is an isoform calling and quantification pipeline for long RNA/cDNA reads mitovar -[Python] - mitovar is a pipeline used for mtDNA genome assembly from NGS reads. primerdiffer -[Python] - primerdiffer is a pipeline used to design primers in a large batch. primervcf - [Python] - primervcf is a sub-module for primerdiffer, to design haplotyping primers using vcf file. prokm6A - prokm6A is a pipeline used to call m6A modification in prokaryotic mRNAs.
